title: 20 Super Cute and Easy Family Halloween Costumes
text:
Dressing up for Halloween can actually be stressful, especially when it comes to picking out costumes for young children in the family. However, picking one shared theme that all family members can participate in not only makes things easier, but it makes the whole dressing up process a lot more fun! (And, it makes for some pretty darn cute Halloween photos).

When it comes to choosing family Halloween costume themes, think of storybook characters costumes, Disney costumes, and their favorite superheroes. You'll find that some family Halloween costumes are actually even cool enough for teens to wear. Here are 23 family-friendly Halloween costume ideas for families big and small, young and old.

For more Halloween ideas, be sure to check Good Housekeeping's Halloween guide on recipes, party decorations, movie recommendations and more.
